name: TheAtlantic
text: Mindy Kaling's "Never Have I Ever"—along with "Selah and the Spades" and "The Half of It"—tells a story about a young woman of color who has the freedom to fumble her way through her teen years, @ethiopienne writes. https://t.co/awGSee7Rc6

name: TheAtlantic
text: "To defend Trump’s business holdings, however, the Justice Department has been forced to reinterpret its own opinions in the narrowest way possible," Jane Chong writes: https://t.co/RTHsV2nMrm

name: TheAtlantic
text: "We push away from what we know." How the work ethic of artists syncs with this moment of pandemic: https://t.co/LaBFmGib6L
